snippet: The delayed arrival of the Boeing 787 Dreamliner and a dispute between pilots has hurt India in its newest effort to shine on the international stage.
abstract: Memo from New Delhi; delayed arrival to India of the Boeing 787 Dreamliner and a dispute between pilots at the state-owned airline Air India is the latest example of how something inevitably goes wrong when the nation tries to showcase its fast-growing economy on the international stage.

byline.contributor: Vikas Bajaj contributed reporting from Mumbai, and Heather Timmons from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: The delayed arrival of the Boeing 787 Dreamliner and a dispute between pilots has hurt India in its newest effort to shine on the international stage.

headline.seo: At Air India, a Nation’s Latest Stumble in the Spotlight
headline.main: In a Time to Shine, India Can’t Get Off the Ground
headline.print_headline: In a Time to Shine, India Can’t Get Off the Ground
